Model.Map

Class MapCellMonster

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Map.MapCell
      • Model.Character
        • Model.Map.MapCellMonster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable, java.io.Serializable

    public class MapCellMonster
extends Character
    This is a map cell monster class. It inherit map cell. To set the monster in the map. According to the row and column, put the monster in the demanded cell.
    See Also:
